title: HelpShift Engineering Talk - Finding all edges on any smallest path between 2 nodes in a DAG
name: HelpShift Engineering Talk - Finding all edges on any smallest path between 2 nodes in a DAG
body:
In this session, I have shared some key insights about my latest research. I have designed an algorithm with the goal of identifying all edges along the shortest path connecting two nodes within a directed acyclic graph (DAG). To access the full article, please browse the "Publications" section.

I thank HelpShift for providing me with this opportunity.

Watch on HelpShift Engineering Youtube Channel: HS Talk - Finding all edges on any smallest path between 2 nodes in a DAG - Deepak
